item.title: Faster
item.description: With peer-to-peer connections link directly from your phone to your computer, you can enjoy the maxium network bandwith available between them for backing up photos and videos.

item.title: Cheaper
item.description: Backing up any amount of full size photos and videos is absolutely free of charge. Our business is supported by displaying limited amount of Ads in 1Album app. You can pay a small monthly fee to make the Ads go away, but this is completely optional.

item.title: More Private
item.description: Your photos and videos are stored privately in your phone or your computer. 1Album and 1Album Blackbox communicate through encrypted direct peer-to-peer channels without tunneling through any servers or strangers. So only you have access to your photos and videos. They never send to us or anyone else.

item.title: Full Size Backup
item.description: 1Album backup full size photos and videos to 1Album Blackbox, so you won’t loose any details in your photos. Live photos are also supported. If a photo have been edited on iPhone, both edited version and the unedited one are backed up.

item.title: Easy to Setup
item.description: 1Album and 1Album Blackbox do not need any special network setup to connect. Our UDP-based peer-to-peer connection can go through most NAT routers. If your computer can browse the Internet, 1Album can connect to 1Album Blackbox installed on your computer. It’s that easy.

item.title: Fail Safe
item.description: You can add multiple 1Album Blackboxes to your account, and they will synchronize with each other automatically. To be even safer, you can put them in different physical locations. You will not loose your data should any one of them fail.

item.title: Works Offline
item.description: When offline, you can still make changes in 1Album or view photos and videos that are already stored on your phone. All the changes you made will synchronize back to 1Album Blackbox when you are online. Likewise, you can setup 1Album Blackbox on a laptop and turn it on only when you need it.

item.title: Works without Blackbox
item.description:
If you don’t have a blackbox or can’t connect to it, 1Album app can still sychronize photos and videos between iPhone and iPad using the same peer-to-peer technology. You can view photos shot by your iPhone from an iPad, and vise versa.

No matter which device you use, 1Album always shows you all photos and videos on all your devices, and done so without sending your photos to the cloud. Just like magic.
